description.value:
The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 1d10 type=lightning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save wis 17 format=long]] or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} exhales &Reference[lightning]{lightning} in a 90-foot &Reference[line]{line} that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that &Reference[line]{line} must make a [[/save dex 19 format=long]], taking [[/damage 12d10 type=lightning average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Blue dragons make their lairs in barren places, using their &Reference[lightning]{lightning} breath and their burrowing ability to carve out crystallized caverns and tunnels beneath the sands.

Thunderstorms rage around a legendary blue dragons lair, and narrow tubes lined with glassy sand ventilate the lair, all the while avoiding the deadly sinkholes that are the dragons first &Reference[line]{line} of defense.

A blue &Reference[dragon]{dragon} will collapse the caverns that make up its lair if that lair is invaded. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} then burrows out, leaving its attackers to be crushed and suffocated. When it returns later, it collects its possessions along with the wealth of the dead intruders.

Lair Actions

On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} cant use the same effect two rounds in a row:

  • Part of the ceiling collapses above one creature that the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can see within 120 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a [[/save dex 15 format=long]] or take [[/damage 3d6 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone} and buried. The buried target is &Reference[restrained]{restrained} and unable to breathe or stand up. A creature can take an action to make a DC 10 &Reference[str]{Strength} check, ending the buried state on a success.
  • A cloud of sand swirls about in a 20-foot-radius &Reference[sphere]{sphere} centered on a point the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can see within 120 feet of it. The cloud spreads around corners. Each creature in the cloud must succeed on a [[/save con 15 format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded]{blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
  • &Reference[lightning]{Lightning} arcs, forming a 5-foot-wide &Reference[line]{line} between two of the lairs solid surfaces that the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can see. They must be within 120 feet of the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} and 120 feet of each other. Each creature in that &Reference[line]{line} must succeed on a [[/save dex 15 format=long]] or take [[/damage 3d6 type=lightning average=true]] damage.
The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Regional Effects

The region containing a legendary blue dragons lair is warped by the dragons magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

  • Thunderstorms rage within 6 miles of the lair.
  • Dust devils scour the land within 6 miles of the lair. A dust devil has the statistics of an air &Reference[elemental]{elemental}, but it cant fly, has a speed of 50 feet, and has an &Reference[int]{Intelligence} and &Reference[cha]{Charisma} of 1 (5).
  • Hidden sinkholes form in and around the dragons lair. A sinkhole can be spotted from a safe distance with a successful DC 20 &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check. Otherwise, the first creature to step on the thin crust covering the sinkhole must succeed on a [[/save dex 15 format=long]] or fall 1d6 10 feet into the sinkhole.

If the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} dies, the dust devils disappear immediately, and the thunderstorms abate within 1d10 days. Any sinkholes remain where they are.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Detect. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} makes a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check.

Tail Attack. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} makes a tail attack.

Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions). The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} must succeed on a [[/save dex 20 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d6 + 7 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can then fly up to half its flying speed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} makes a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} must succeed on a [[/save dex 20 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d6 + 7 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can then fly up to half its flying speed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Legendary Resistance (3/Day). If the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
